      • join

        java.lang.String join​(Player p,
                      java.lang.String roomName,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Handles client's attempt to join game
        Parameters:
        p - player
        roomName - name of the room
        password - password of the room
        Returns:
        ok is successfully joined and error otherwise
        Requires
        p!= null && roomName != null && password != null
        Ensures
        p.getGame().getName() == roomName
